The 'Action-Adventure' tag on SteamDB lists games that combine elements of action and adventure genres. These games typically feature a protagonist who explores a new or mysterious environment, interacts with non-playable characters, and engages in physically challenging activities such as combat, puzzle solving, or platforming. The action elements may include real-time combat with enemies, quick reflexes, and timing-based challenges. The adventure aspects can involve exploration, storyline-driven progression, and narrative elements that immerse the player in a rich and engaging world. Games tagged as 'Action-Adventure' on SteamDB offer a diverse range of experiences, from open-world explorations to linear narrative-driven adventures.

This page contains: The 'Action-Adventure' tag on SteamDB lists games that combine elements of action and adventure genres. These games typically feature a protagonist who explores a new or mysterious environment, interacts with non-playable characters, and engages in physically challenging activities such as combat, puzzle solving, or platforming.
